title: Nervana
longDescription: We partnered with Nervana to redefine their brand identity and create a web experience that communicates trust and innovation. The project involved in-depth user research, leading to a design that is both accessible and technologically forward-looking, setting a new standard in the health-tech industry.

title: Runway
description: The finance platform your team doesn't hate
longDescription: We partnered with Runway Financial to craft a new identity and website that has users running to grab a window seat. Drawing inspiration from airport signage, wayfinding, and the air flight experience, the team created a first-class brand that stands out from the crowd.

title: Campfire
description: Collaborative tools for the modern age
longDescription: Campfire's mission is to bring teams together. Our task was to create a visual identity and a suite of marketing materials that felt warm, inviting, and collaborative. The result is a brand that feels both professional and human.

title: Journey
description: An iOS app for mindful travelers.
longDescription: For Journey, we designed an intuitive and beautiful iOS application that helps users plan and document their travels. The UI/UX was crafted to be a seamless and enjoyable part of the travel experience itself.
